Raiding parties of wittershin have set out from the mountains to wreak havoc and destruction upon men. These assaults were followed by a full scale war led by the mighty race of rephaim, from whom the conflict was so named, the War of the Giants.

It has been seven years since the War of the Giants ended, and the nations of men have slowly been recovering from their staggering losses. A keep has been constructed to maintain vigil over the mountain pass, should the enemy ever decide to rear its ugly head again. All would appear to be calm, for now. But appearances are deceiving, for deep within the mountains that same evil so recently released is stirring yet again.

Illfrost: Bondage represents the first step into the Illfrost Adventure Path, which will ultimately span 30 levels. This adventure is designed for five 1st-Level PCs, and will quickly introduce them to this unique and harsh campaign setting by starting them off as slaves.

Illfrost: Bondage is a 4th Edition compatible Heroic First Level Adventure Path Module from Illusionary Press that will have your players chilled to the bone, not only by its brutal environment, but also by its perilous challenges and unimaginable horrors.

Illfrost: Bondage is based in the world of Illfrost created by Don Pritchett, but easily adaptable to your own campaign setting. Cartography by Jonathan Roberts. Artwork by Chris Quilliams.

The Illfrost campaign setting is a vast world whose frozen reaches will truly test your players as they face new monsters, struggle to survive in an unforgiving climate, and face a dread so malevolent that it will leave them shivering in their fur-lined boots and eagerly coming back for more...if they survive!

Challenge your players. Challenge your game. Challenge yourself!

119261.name: Illfrost: Quick Start Guide
119261.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Forged by Envy - Tempered by Malice

Illfrost: Quick Start Guide is a supplement designed to allow the DM to jump right into the game world of Illfrost with resources to give you the information you need to start your campaign with minimal preparation. You will find enough resources here to give your players the information they need to create their characters and backgrounds with confidence.

Illfrost is a gritty, hard edged Adventure Path which embodies the classic struggle between good and ill. The setting takes place on the frozen continent of Lannithir, in the world of Olam, approximately one century after the fall of western civilization. This campaign makes use of the game mechanics found in Dungeons & Dragons 4th Edition, and is designed to take your players from 1st to 30th level.

The Illfrost campaign setting is a vast world whose frozen reaches will truly test your players as they face new monsters, struggle to survive in an unforgiving climate, and face a dread so malevolent that it will leave them shivering in their fur-lined boots and eagerly coming back for more... if they survive!

Challenge your players. Challenge your game. Challenge yourself!

119262.name: Illfrost: Retribution
119262.description:
UNPUBLISHED PRODUCT




it appears this Item will never be published
this Item has been moved to (Unpublished Products)
there should be no product images submitted to this entry




Publisher's blurb:

Forged by Envy - Tempered by Malice

Illfrost: Retribution is a heroic second level adventure path module.

Illfrost is a gritty, hard edged Adventure Path which embodies the classic struggle between good and ill. The setting takes place on the frozen continent of Lannithir, in the world of Olam, approximately one century after the fall of western civilization. This campaign makes use of the game mechanics found in Dungeons & Dragons 4th Edition, and is designed to take your players from 1st to 30th level.

The Illfrost campaign setting is a vast world whose frozen reaches will truly test your players as they face new monsters, struggle to survive in an unforgiving climate, and face a dread so malevolent that it will leave them shivering in their fur-lined boots and eagerly coming back for more... if they survive!

Challenge your players. Challenge your game. Challenge yourself!

119263.name: Cultists of Havra Zhoul
119263.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Order of the Dictum fights crime and corruption in a lawless society. They are the voice of the people, and an ally to those who desire law and order. But are they as benevolent as they seem? Is the code of order they seek to establish what the people truly want? A dark force lurks at the centre of this cult, and those that expect to find a kindred vigilant may instead discover too late that the people's wants do not count at all. For all that counts for the Order of the Dictum is the law. The law of Havra Zhoul.

"I am Havra Zhoul. Respect me. Obey me. Fear me. If you are unpure, take your spouse and offspring and their offspring, and flee, for it will be your undoing to stand and fight. Flee as fast and far as you can run, and faster and further still! Lest I track you down and slay you, you and your kin, until all discord is purged from this realm. And if, instead, you are pure, and free of the taint of chaos, then flock to me. Bow down and subject yourself to my edicts, to my commands, to my word. For my word is law." The Dictum—Section 1: Introductions

This product is a Dual Format PDF. The downloadable ZIP file contains two versions, one optimised for printing and use on a normal computer and one optimised for use on a mobile device such as an iPad.

This ZIP file also contains a separate PDF containing the product's compiled stat blocks enabling the busy GM to build up a handy library of ready-to-go stat blocks.

119265.name: Hospital Rush
119265.description:
Paging all interns! New patients have arrived in the ER, and you want to fight — whether fairly or not – against the other interns to prove that you're the right person for the open doctor position at the hospital.

In Hospital Rush, the player interns compete against one another to be the first with ten prestige points. Each round, players place two pawns on various fair and unfair actions, with unfair actions possibly being punished later by other players. During the game, the players collect medicine, learn new skills, take exams, and treat patients. May the best (or most devious) intern win!

119266.name: Space Siege
119266.description:
The survival of the human race lies entirely in your hands in Space Siege, a brand-new action-RPG from Chris Taylor, the creator of the award-winning Dungeon Siege games. Space Siege puts you in the shoes of Seth Walker, a crew member on the Armstrong - the only colony ship to survive a massive alien attack upon Earth. As the aliens descend upon the Armstrong, Walker must fend off the extraterrestrial threat using his wits and weapons. To help his cause, he can choose to augment his body with a variety of cybernetic upgrades available throughout the Armstrong - but with each mechanical improvement, he becomes more machine than man. In this spectacular sci-fi adventure, will you risk your own humanity to save the human race?

Features:

A New Direction and Setting for the Popular Siege Series
Space Siege moves the Siege franchise out of the dungeons and into space. You can take on cybernetically-enhanced superhuman powers in a story-driven, action-packed, futuristic sci-fi environment.

Multiple Gameplay Paths
Each decision you make will affect both the gameplay and the story, creating surprise twists and turns and great replayability.

In-depth Customizing Options
You can improve Seth's fighting abilities with a vast array of cybernetic upgrades. Bolster your armor and other equipment and add impressive weapon upgrades, such as crushing melee damage, massive range attacks, and much more.

Four-way Co-Op Multiplayer
Up to four players can take part in the epic Space Siege battles, allowing for a variety of cooperative approaches to combat.

Upgradeable Robot Companion
You're not completely alone in this fight your constant robot companion, HR-V, will help you in your battles with the alien enemy. And like you, HR-V can also be upgraded to deal massive damage and help you out in a variety of other ways.

Immersive Sci-Fi Storyline
The engrossing story plunges you into a chaotic universe where you must make split-second decisions while battling the vicious invaders. The future of humanity rests on the decisions you make as you defend Earth's last surviving colony ship against the alien scourge. Explore the entirety of the massive ship Armstrong and find the most appropriate places to engage the enemy. Nothing less than the fate of the human race hangs in the balance!

Tactical Combat Action
Rarely does an action-RPG offer so many tactical maneuvers, including ambushes, ranged or melee attacks, cybernetic upgrades to different abilities that help you defeat an enemy or get out of a tight spot, and much more.

Futuristic Firepower
High-tech weaponry and armor, combined with advanced cybernetic upgrades, empower players with powerful new ways to blow the aliens into oblivion.

Source: The Publisher Website.

119267.name: Virtua Tennis 2009
119267.description:
From the publisher's site:

The world’s top tennis stars are hitting the courts again as SEGA’s best-selling tennis series smashes back into action on PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, PC and the Wii.

Create your own player, join the new World Tour, where you will be trained by a real-life legend of tennis, and compete for the 1 ranking against the planet’s biggest stars. Then take your character online and prove you’re the best with the new online ranking system!

With brand new courts to test your skills in, a new roll call of tennis stars to compete against and even more popular court minigames, Virtua Tennis 2009 is set to be a bigger hitter than ever before!

119268.name: Ancient Quest of Saqqarah
119268.description:
Once every thousand years a mysterious eclipse shrouds the ancient pyramid of Saqqarah. With help of Khufu – the Magical Monkey from the Underground Oasis, solve over 500 challenging puzzles spread across 7 different temples and restore mysterious powers of ancient Egypt in this rich and original matching game.

Deep and varied gameplay, hundreds of levels, outstanding visuals, captivating music, many trophies to collect and lively voice-acting all make Saqqarah our biggest and most ambitious game so far. A game that we’re sure you’ll enjoy a lot and for a long time!

7 different puzzle mechanics
Hidden Object bonus rounds
Over 500 hand crafted levels
Superb high definition graphics
Earn Ranks, Trophies and magic powers
Epic and engaging storyline narration

Source: The Developer Website.

119269.description:
The game board shows a map of London. Players roll a die and move through the city, trying to reach the famous sites (especially those two whose cards they drew at the beginning and which are marked). Additionally, taxis, buses and the tube can be used to get around more quickly, but they have to be paid for in travel chips. When a player reaches a site, s/he is asked a question. If answering correctly, the site card can be discarded and a new travel chip is drawn. When reaching an unmarked site, they can earn a new site card (if that belongs to someone else, it can be "stolen").
When a player can reach both sites they drew at the beginning and gain two more site cards and return to their starting location, s/he wins the game.

Questions come in two difficulty levels, as the game is designed for language learning. So the difficulty does not refer to the knowledge needed to answer the question, but to the English speaking ability.
119269.name: A Weekend in London

119270.name: Ein Wochenende in Berlin
119270.description:
The game board shows a map of Berlin. Players roll a die and move through the city, trying to reach the famous sites (especially those two whose cards they drew at the beginning and which are marked). Additionally, taxis, buses and the tube can be used to get around more quickly, but they have to be paid for in travel chips. When a player reaches a site, s/he is asked a question. If answering correctly, the site card can be discarded and a new travel chip is drawn. When reaching an unmarked site, they can earn a new site card (if that belongs to someone else, it can be "stolen").
When a player can reach both sites they drew at the beginning and gain two more site cards and return to their starting location, s/he wins the game.

Each card has two questions, one about German, one a trivia question, so language learners can play it with non-language learners as well.

119271.name: Fear for Sale: The Mystery of McInroy Manor
119271.description:
Emma Roberts has been tasked with writing a story about an old haunted manor for Fear for Sale Magazine. The estate has been locked up for years, but a sizable donation from Emma’s editor has opened up the home for exploration. Unravel the tale of the demise of the McInroy family, and set their souls free in Fear for Sale: Mystery of McInroy Manor, a dark and mysterious Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game.

Source: The Publisher Website.

119272.name: Greek Salad
119272.description:
Greek Salad is a 2-6 player card game for ages 6+

Help the chefs prepare a Greek Salad! Obey their orders, add veggies and seasonings, mix the ingredients and the salad is done! The first player to get rid of all of his cards is the winner.

The object of the game is to be the first to get rid of all of your cards. You accomplish this by playing a card with a more of one type of ingridient that the last card played. For example if the last card played had 2 peppers, 4 tomatoes & 1 peice of feta cheese the next card played must contain either 5 tomatoes, 3 peppers or 2 pieces of feta cheese, if you can't play a card you must draw a card.

There are special 'seasoning' cards which skip alayers turn and mix up the discard pile. There are also two more special cards: the chef allows you to declare an ingredient you either want or don't want and the subsequent players must abide and the salad bowl card which reverses the logic of the rules so that for the example above with the peppers, tomatoes and cheese you would need a card with less than one of those ingredients. First one to discard all his cars wins.

119273.name: Eat Thyself
119273.description:
An abstract strategy game created for the 2012 Global Game Jam.

The game is played on a circular board, without a set number of "spaces", but rather the game pieces also make up the number of spaces, and as pieces are captured, the board will shrink until one player has only one piece left, and they are the winner.

Players have two movement cards laying visible in front of them, and choose how many spaces to move their "king" pieces by flipping one of the cards (thus changing the number of spaces they may potentially move their next turn). The game can be changed subtly by choosing a different set of movement cards to play with each game.

119276.name: Maken Shao
119276.description:
Maken Shao: Demon Sword, originally released without the subtitle as Maken Shao (魔剣爻) in Japan, is an action game created by the company Atlus. The 爻 (shao) used in the title is a very rarely used kanji in Japanese, and is used merely to signify 'XX' (as in the sequel to 'X'). It is an enhanced remake of the Dreamcast game Maken X, with the most significant difference being that Maken Shao is played via a third-person perspective, as opposed to the first-person environment found in Maken X. The game's story is based on Maken X, a genetic creation that can cure mental illnesses. This genetic device has its own mind, and can take control of a persons body through their weapons.

Source: Wikipedia, "Maken Shao", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

119278.name: Grim Tales: The Legacy
119278.description:
After being invited to the Christening of your sister’s son, you arrive to find a deserted estate in Grim Tales: The Legacy! After getting married to the love of her life, it seems like a happy ending is right around the corner for your sister. However, all is not well. The sounds of ravenous beasts echo through the halls of the once great estate and your sister is missing! Use your Hidden Object talents to track down her family and save them in Grim Tales: The Legacy!

Source: The Publisher Website.

119279.name: Grim Tales: The Bride
119279.description:
After your sister vanishes on her wedding day no one has any idea what happened to her, so it’s up to you to find the truth! Some believe she drowned, but her body was never found. Return to the abandoned family mansion and search for clues in Grim Tales: The Bride. Explore your sister’s memories to solve the mystery of her disappearance in this exciting Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

Source: The Publisher Website.

119280.name: Witches' Legacy: The Charleston Curse
119280.description:
End the Charleston Curse before it wipes out an entire family and save a young girl in Witches’ Legacy: The Charleston Curse! After finding out that you are the last living relative to a young orphan named Lynn, you discover the terrifying tale of her family. The Charlestons have been systematically killed by a witch and now it’s up to you to protect Lynn! Confront the terrifying witch and save Lynn in Witches’ Legacy: The Charleston Curse!

Source: The Publisher Website.

119281.name: Mad Hatters: The Mad-Cap Feel It and Find It Game
119281.description: Following instructions from the Mad Hatter cards, players attempt to remove the corresponding object from the brim of their own cap (special caps included). However, players are allowed to identify each object only by touch--no looking is allowed. If a player can correctly name the object, only then may they remove it. If a player removes the wrong object, they must put it back on their cap and pick up another object to add to their cap. The object is to be the first player to identify and correctly remove eight objects.

119283.name: Dragon Ball Z: Ultimate Tenkaichi
119283.description:
Dragon Ball Z: Ultimate Tenkaichi, known in Japan as Dragon Ball: Ultimate Blast , is a video game based of the manga and anime franchise Dragon Ball. It was developed by Spike and distributed by Namco Bandai starting late October of 2011 for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 gaming consoles.

The game is a 3D fighter that allows players to take controls of various characters from the Dragon Ball franchise or created by the player to either fight against the AI, or with another player locally or online.

Source: Wikipedia, "Dragon Ball Z: Ultimate Tenkaichi", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

119284.name: Snake Byte
119284.description:
User Summary

In Snake Byte, players guide their snake around the map, eating up apples. As apples are eaten, the snake grows in length, and colliding with a wall or yourself will end your game. Taking too long to eat an apple will result in a penalty.

119285.name: The Whirlpool Game
119285.description:
Each player uses 6 men, but puts only one on the board at a time. He moves each turn as far as spun with the arrow, doing as directed on the spaces at which he stops. As soon as this man is drawn into the whirlpool, or center, it is lost and another is started.

The player holding out the longest wins.

119286.name: XG-1
119286.description:
The XG-1 is the light gun that came bundled with the Atari XEGS that was released in 1987. The XEGS, which stands for "XE Game System", was an Atari 65XE computer reworked cosmetically to give the appearance of a game console. The light gun was bundled to compete with the Nintendo Entertainment System. The XEGS came with one light gun game, called Bug Hunt. The XG-1 is compatible with the Atari 7800 video game console. And since the Atari 7800 is backwards compatible, the XG-1 also works on the Atari 2600. Atari eventually released five games on the 7800 that used the gun: Alien Brigade, Barnyard Blaster, Crossbow, Meltdown and Sentinel.

The XG-1 is simply a specialized light pen. Light pen support was built into the earliest Atari computers, but it never really caught on. In fact, all lightgun games for the XEGS could be played with the light pen and vice versa. Many users complained of horrible accuracy of the device, especially when compared to the NES Zapper. Some XEGS users preferred to rewire the Sega Master System Light Phaser for use.

Source: Wikipedia, "XG-1", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

119287.name: Light Phaser
119287.description:
The Light Phaser was a light gun created for the Sega Master System, modeled after the Zillion gun from the Japanese anime series of the same name. The phaser was heavier than its Nintendo counterpart, the Nintendo Zapper, but considered by some to have a more responsive trigger and more accurate targeting. As with the Japanese-market Nintendo Zapper, the Light Phaser looked realistic enough to warrant parental pressure to alter the device so that police would not confuse it with a real gun. Altered Light Phasers are distinguished by a hand-painted neon orange tip and are much rarer than their solid color counterparts. Tec Toy also released a blue Light Phaser in Brazil.

Source: Wikipedia, "Sega Master System," available under the CC-BY-SA License.

119291.name: All About Scranton
119291.description:
Promotional game for businesses in Scranton, Pennsylvania. Players travel round the town, visiting shops. To win you must be the first to collect all the items on your shopping list.

One in a large series of 'All About' games

119292.name: All About Ulster County New York
119292.description:
Each player visits the shops and businesses and collects cards as detailed on their shopping list. The first to return home to their residence with the travel cards for all the locations on their list, wins.

The locations are real businesses in Ulster County, and this game was made as a promotional item for the town.

119293.description:

119294.description:

119295.name: Nordwärts
119295.description:
user summary

This is a free adventure for LodlanD for up to 7 players. This adventure is usefull to bring the players to Liberty after 103 sE. (after the war between Liberty and RDL)

119296.name: Doppelte Lüge: Teil 1
119296.description:
user summary

This is a free adventure for LodlanD for up to 5 players. This adventure continues the adventure from the core rules (1st edition) "Rettungseinsatz"

119297.name: Doppelte Lüge: Teil 2
119297.description:
user summary

This is a free adventure for LodlanD for up to 5 players. This adventure continues the adventure Doppelte Lüge - Teil 1 which starts from the core rules (1st edition) "Rettungseinsatz". Under some circumstances this adventure can be played without the previous parts. (rules are included)

This is also the last part of the small campaign

119308.name: Gildenbrief (Issue 46 - Dec 2000)
119308.description: This issue contains the adventure part "Ein Botschafter des DajranKhan" and 10 new spells.

119309.name: Gildenbrief (Issue 47 - Aug 2001)
119309.description: This issue contains the advnenture "Nebel des Hasses" and background material to "Zum Grünen Drachen"

119310.name: Gildenbrief (Issue 48 - Apr 2002)
119310.description: This issue contains an article about "Kynodore". It also contains articles about magical artifacts.

119311.name: Gildenbrief (Issue 49 - Oct 2002)
119311.description: This issue contains the adventure "Orc-Spuren" and 4 new spells

119312.name: Gildenbrief (Issue 50 - Jan 2003)
119312.description: This issue contains an article about the swordmaster of the Dracotari school in Candranor. It also contains the adventure "Vier letzte Lieder"

119313.name: Sexkanten
119313.description: An old swedish wordgame based on 40 sixsided wooden pieces that can be fit to each other into a long row. On each side there are a word written. By combining different pieces and put them toghether you form sentences. There are different way of playing and scoring. The easiest way is that each player in one minute tries to form an as long sentence as possibly. After you have done a sentence you can change the meaning by twisting the wooden pieces and score extra points.

119314.name: Dodéka
119314.description:
In his turn, the player rolls the 3 x d12 dice and keeps what he wants. Then he may re-roll twice any dice.
The goal is score points for combinations:
f.e. pair scores 40 points, straigh scores 100 points, sum of 13 scores 250 points, three of a kind scores 500 points etc.
Game ends if any player has points 700 or more. He is the winner.
But if somebody gets combination sum of 13 including pair he wins the game immediately.

Contents:

3 x d12
45 chips

119315.description:
Spyramid is a game for the Shibumi set that explores a new victory condition.

The board starts empty.

Two players (white and black) alternate turns either:

- Placing a ball of their colour on an empty hole or platform.

- Removing a ball of their colour that supports at most 1 ball on the level above and placing it in another valid location, except above balls dropped. Balls may drop as a result of ball removing.

Victory condition:

First player creating the 5 vertices of a pyramid of any size wins (example: 4 board corners and the apex). The pyramid can be facing up or down (apex above or below the base). In case of two or more pyramids of different colours being created, the player that did the last move wins.

Ties seem to be possible.

Note: The pyramid can be of any size (2x2,3x3,4x4). There are 14 pyramids facing up and 5 small (2x2) pyramids facing down.

Variant: The pyramid can be also rotated 45 degrees when viewed from above.

Included in the Shibumi Rule Book

Soft cover:

http://www.lulu.com/shop/cameron-browne-and-nestor-romeral-a...

Downloadable PDF:

http://www.nestorgames.com/rulebooks/SHIBUMI_EN.pdf
119315.name: Spyramid

119316.name: United Square
119316.description:
There are 12 tiles with 4 colors red, blue, green and yellow for each of 4 players with his color on backside.
In his turn player places the tile on the 5x5 grid gameboard so that all colors of the adjacent tiles fit.
Object is to form squares of the own color while preventing others to do so.

119318.name: Envoyer (Issue 43 - May 2000)
119318.description: This issue contains the shadowrun adventure "As time goes by..." and a scenario for market and carney

119319.name: Zombies & Zeppelins
119319.description:
The year is 1922. A pandemic is sweeping the globe. At first, scientists believe it to be yet another wave of the Spanish Flu. In the disease’s early stages, patients present with high fever, vomiting, and weakness. Quickly, the Spanish Flu theory comes under scrutiny. Patients all report having been attacked. Where the disease spreads violent crime seems to inexplicably rise. As outbreaks skyrocket, several studies conclusively prove the disease in not the dreaded Spanish Flu; it is something much worse. Late stage symptoms are found to include death, reanimation, superhuman strength, and an insatiable craving for human flesh.

After precious few years of peace, the nations of the world are returning once more to the trenches, united against a common foe. In Zombies & Zeppelins, 2-4 players lead the forces of humanity against hordes of the undead. Together, players must attempt to clear the numerous infested cities around the world. Should they fail, mankind will be swept away in a tide of the damned.

Zombies & Zeppelins is played on a game board depicting a map of the world which has been divided into 25 regions. The game uses a card-driven system to determine both the spread of the undead and humanity's military capacity. Player's must carefully manage their meager resources in combating the undead. Through clever maneuvering of their infantry, armor and artillery, and a little bit of luck, players might just be able to avert Armageddon.

119320.name: Tefr:  Knowledge is Power
119320.description:
From publisher's description:

Knowledge is Power is a full resource for Tefr narrators running role playing scenarios set in the Tefr World. It includes a comprehensive menagerie of Tefr creatures, the unabridged codex of Enchanting magic as well as the complete system for sorcery.

Currently available for play-testing and feedback in a single volume, this beta version of the Knowledge is Power book may be downloaded for free for play testing

The revised version is currently being edited and early adopters will be sent a discount code when the first edition is published.

119321.name: Saga 7: Neues aus Adramil
119321.description:
user summary / from the back of the book

Neues aus Adramil (News from Adramil) is a source book for SAGA. This book answers more question about the dragon cult, if there is a dragon at Nir...


time table
background
maps and drawings
NPCs
adventure ideas (not only for SAGA)

119322.name: Tefr: Prelude to Rhapsody
119322.description:
From publisher's website:

Prelude to Rhapsody provides narrators and players with all the basics needed to create characters and begin the story. It also offers plenty of hooks to take that story wherever inspiration steers it.

Beta versions of the book are available for play-testing and feedback. The e-book is available for free download, and the print version can be purchased at reduced cost for a limited time.

The revised version is currently being edited and early adopters will be sent a discount code when the first edition is published.

119323.name: OnLive Game System
119323.description:
The OnLive Game System consists of an OnLive Wireless Controller and a console, called the "MicroConsole TV Adapter", that can be connected to a television and directly to the OnLive service, so it is possible to use the service without a computer. It comes with the accessories needed to connect the equipment, and composite video users can purchase an additional optional cable. The MicroConsole supports up to four wireless controllers and multiple Bluetooth headsets. It also has two USB ports for game controllers, keyboards, mice, and USB hubs. For video and audio output it provides component, HDMI, TOSLINK ports, and an analog stereo minijack. An ethernet port is used for network access, which is required to access the OnLive service. Pre-orders for the OnLive Game System began to be taken on November 17, 2010.

Source: Wikipedia, "Onlive", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

119324.name: All the Fun of the Fair
119324.description:
From publisher's website:

The first in a campaign centered about the kingdom of Terasonia, this is a basic scenario to introduce both players and narrators to the world and system of Tefr. It also provides detailed maps and information about the town of Erdir where the scenario takes place. This is a useful tool for any narrator as it can be adapted to serve as any reasonably sized market town.

119325.name: The Horn of the Clan
119325.description:
From the publisher's website:
This is the second scenario in the Erdir campaign. In which the characters will need to turn detective, then bounty hunters. But there is a lot more history attached to the stolen horn than is at first apparent, and there may be several twists before the story is told.

119326.name: Ein Traum von Macht
119326.description:
from the back of the book
While investigating two magical artifacts a wizard of Andergaster develops a revolutionary idea. But to prove it, someone has to travel to the sites of the artifacts and search for further clues. So a party of brave heroes travels to the inaccessible mountain region of Thorwal in order to visit one of the legendary elfs. From there, a mysterious trail leads not only to the far north, but especially deep into the elven past.

This adventure is suitable for beginners, but can be adapted without much effort to experienced players and heroes.

119327.name: Gildenbrief: Die Träume der Kinder
119327.description:
Gildenbrief Sonderband - Die Träume der Kinder

The dreams of the children or Sailor Midgard

Midgard meets Sailermoon, this an adventure for up to 5 players (Grade 4) designed for Midgard 3. The adventure has a Sailermmon theme with 5 pre-created female heroes (childre about 14years)

119328.name: Interface Zero: Edycja polska
119328.description:
user summary

Polish translation of Interface Zero (Savage Worlds) but with some additional content so a separate RPG Item.

119330.name: Eclipse
119330.description:
From the back of the cover:

Trzymasz w rękach uzupełnienie podręcznika, opisujące zagrożony atakiem Hordy układ Eclipse. Zawarte tu materiały uatrakcyjnią wasze sesje: zarówno nową mechaniką, jk i informacjami o świecie i pomysłami na przygody. Całość otwiera podręcznik gracza, czyli zbiór zawad, przewag oraz modyfikacji statków kosmicznych dla postaci graczy i ich pojazdów. Kolejny rozdział poświęcony jest w całości problemom statusu społecznego i majątku – znajdziesz w nim narzędzia ułatwiające określenie pozycji towarzyskiej bohatera, alternatywny system zarządzania finansami, mechanizm ułatwiający wprowadzenie do gry stałej pracy bohaterów oraz zasady pozwalające drużynie wzbogacić się na międzygwiezdnym handlu. Część dla gracza kończy nowy sprzęt, na którym bohaterowie – i łotry – chętnie położą ręce.

Część dla Mistrza Gry otwiera generator przygód, który wspomoże jego diaboliczną kreatywność. Kolejne rozdziały rozszerzają informacje o planetach systemu Eclipse, a na końcu prowadzący znajdzie wyjaśnienie mrocznych tajemnic Nemezis. Dzieło wieńczy zaś kilkunastu nowych przeciwników (albo czasem współpracowników) graczy – od żołnierzy z Cor po nowe potwory Hordy.

Dobrej zabawy!

User's summary in english:

This is sourcebook describing Eclipse star system and it's three main planets: Ash, Bariz and Cor. It includes both material for players and game masters. There are new rules related to the star system as well as more detailed than in the campaign setting description of each of the three planets.

119331.name: Dodatki Specjalne. Nemezis: Edycja Limitowana
119331.description:
user summary

It is actually add-on to the pre-ordered Eclipse sourcebook for Nemezis setting.

119332.description:
Spoker is a game with random elements for the Shibumi game system. SHIBUMI MEETS POKER!

Equipment: the 4x4 Shibumi board and 10 balls of each color (white, black and red). Two players.

Rules

The board starts empty. Players take turns taking a ball at random, for example from a non-transparent bag, and placing it either on empty board holes or stacking on 2x2 platforms of existing balls.

When a player, with the ball just placed, has formed a visible winning group of balls (see below) he shows it and challenges the opponent, so also the other player takes at random a ball and places it trying to do a group of higher ranking.

The player with the higher ranking group wins the challenge and scores one point. If the two groups have the same ranking, each player scores one point. Obviously if the other player is not able to form a winning group he loses the challenge.
Winning groups can be in any level and also composed by balls placed in different levels. Between two groups of the same ranking, the winner (if exists) is the group with at least a ball at a higher level than the other group.

The game ends when the 30 balls pyramid is complete and the winner is the player with the highest score at the end of the game.
Apex ball can be used only to respond to a challenge, or to form a “straight flush”.

If the placement of a ball creates two or more winning groups, you must always consider the highest ranking group.

When a player has formed a “straight flush”, he wins immediately the game, regardless of the score.

WINNING GROUPS in ASCENDING RANKING ORDER

Three of three kinds: a straight line of three touching balls of different colors, in any order, orthogonal or one on top of the other (when they are in different levels);
Flush three: a straight line of three touching balls of the same color, orthogonal or one on top of the other (when they are in different levels);
Full house: a five balls pyramid formed by two touching balls of the same color and two touching balls of another color in the platform, and a ball of one of that two colors on the top;
Flush four: a straight line of four touching balls of the same color, orthogonal or one on top of the other (when they are in different levels);
Straight flush: a five balls pyramid of the same color.
119332.name: Spoker

119333.description:
Aion is a strategic game of tile laying for two players based on the ancient symbol of the Ouroboros or Aion. The Aion is a powerful alchemical symbol of rebirth and represents the infinite transmutability of matter. During the game, players will play tiles representing alchemical runes and materials to the board while trying to form looped serpents to score points.

Aion was the winning entry of the Ottawa jam site in the Concept category of the 2012 Global Game Jam.
119333.name: Aion: A Game Of Serpents

119334.name: Elisera
119334.description:
from the back of the book

Lebt die Prinzessin noch? Kann eine Geschichte, die vor vielen Jahren blutig begann, ein gutes Ende finden? Es liegt in der Hand der mutigen Abenteurerinnen und Abenteurer, eine gefahrenvolle Suche zu bestehen.
- Ein Abenteuer für 4-6 Spieler der Stufen 1-2.
- Kann optional als erster Teil der Serie "Abenteuer aus Trion" gespielt werden.
- Speziell für Einsteiger und Neulinge konzipiert.
- Vier vorgefertigte Spielcharaktere enthalten.
- Kurzregeln für den schnellen Einstieg der Spieler liegen bei.
- Detaillierte Hinweise und Richtlinien für Spielleiter.
- Benötigt nur das Rolemaster Grundregelwerk und zwei zehnseitige Würfel.

English translation by Google

The princess still alive? Can a story that began many years ago, bloody, find a happy ending? It lies in the hands of brave adventurers and explorers to pass a dangerous quest.
- An adventure for 4-6 players of levels 1-2.
- Can optionally be the first part of the series "Adventures of Trion."
- Specially designed for beginners and novices.
- Include four pre-generated characters.
- Short rules for a quick start are included.
- Detailed information and guidelines for the dungeon master.
- Requires only the Rolemaster rulebook and two ten-sided dice.

119335.name: Trolle!
119335.description:
from the back of the book

Die Schatten des Casnewydd-Waldes, ein machthungriger Trollkönig und zahlreiche Überfalle sorgen für Angst und Schrecken im Westen Trions. In "Trolle!" werden die Helden, die schon in Elisera Ruhm und Ehre erlangt haben, ein weiteres Mal auf die Probe gestellt. Spüren Sie den fauligen Atem der Waldtrolle, oder erfahren Sie, was es heißt gegen einen voll ausgewachsenen Kriegstroll zu kämpfen. Gehen Sie auf die gefährliche Reise durch den Casnewydd-Wald, und finden Sie heraus, warum die Trolle los sind. Dabei können Sie "Trolle!" als Teil einer Ganzen Abenteuer-Reihe spielen, die Sie immer wieter in die Machtspiele Aboreas einführen wird, oder auch als ganz eigenständiges Abenteuer.
- Ein Abenteuer für 4-6 Spieler der Stufen 2-3.
- Kann optional als zweiter Teil der Serie "Abenteuer aus Trion" gespielt werden.
- Vorgefertigte Spielcharaktere enthalten.
- Benötigt nur das Rolemaster Grundregelwerk und zwei zehnseitige Würfel.

Google translation

The shadow of the forest-Casnewydd, a power hungry Troll King and numerous case ensure fear and terror in the west of Trion. In "Troll!" are the heroes who have already attained in Elisera glory and honor to once again put to the test. Feel the foul breath of the forest trolls, or learn what it means to fight against a full-blown war troll. Go to the perilous journey through the forest Casnewydd, and find out why the trolls are going. You can play "troll!" as part of a whole series of adventure that you will lead deeper into Aborea, or as a completely original storyline.
- An adventure for 4-6 players of levels 2-3.
- Can optionally be played as the second part of the series "Adventures of Trion."
- Pre-generated characters included.
- Requires only the Rolemaster rulebook and two ten-sided dice

119336.name: Der blutende Gott
119336.description:
from the back of the book

Und wieder ist Leet Ausgangspunkt für ein spannendes Abenteuer, als eine rätselhafte Substanz Pflanzen, Tiere und Menschen verändert und nicht einmal vor den Helden halt macht. Mit dem Auftrag in der Tasche, dem Ganzen auf den Grund zu gehen, macht sich die Gruppe auf den Weg durch das Umland von Leet. Die Spur führt sie zu einer geheimnisumwobenen Stätte, in der sich eine Gruppe Orks häuslich niedergelassen hat. Doch in den unteren Ebenen des alten Gemäuers lauert etwas weitaus Schlimmeres... Ein Wettlauf gegen die Zeit und die eigene Erschöpfung beginnt.
- Ein Abenteuer für 4-6 Spieler.
- Kann optional als dritter Teil der Serie "Abenteuer aus Trion" gespielt werden.
- Vorgefertigte Spielcharaktere enthalten.
- Benötigt nur das Rolemaster Grundregelwerk und zwei zehnseitige Würfel.

Google translation

And again Leet is starting point for an exciting adventure that when a mysterious substance changes plants, animals, people and even the heroes. With the task to seek out the truth, the group makes their way through the countryside of Leet. The trail leads to a mysterious place in which a group of orcs has settled at home. But in the lower levels of the old building lurks something far worse ... A race against time and their own exhaustion begins.
- An adventure for 4-6 players.
- Can be played as a third optional part of the series "Adventures of Trion."
- Pre-generated characters included.
- Requires only the Rolemaster rulebook and two ten-sided dice.

boardgamehonor.22668: 2013 UK Games Expo Best Boardgame Nominee

119337.description:
Game description from the publisher:

Aeroplanes: Aviation Ascendant explores the dawn of commercial aviation, an exciting era between 1919 and 1939. Experience the difficulties and triumphs of commercial airlines in Europe, pioneering airports and service in continental Europe and around the world!

Aviation spurred the growth of intercontinental travel, and airlines struggled to dominate the regions of the globe that they served.

Rapid technological advances in planes play a vital role in this development as you compete to purchase newer more efficient aeroplanes, build airports, and move passengers around the globe. Earn bonuses and prestige for being the first to fly to North or South America, and win by maintaining the most airports around the world and by running your airline profitably.

Can you balance your investment in aeroplanes, customer service, and routes well enough to become the premier airline of the era? The fate and future of air travel lies within your hands!
119337.name: Aeroplanes: Aviation Ascendant

119338.name: Das Monster von Leet
119338.description:
from the back of the book

Ein namenloser Schrecken sucht Leet und das Umland heim. Mysteriöse Geschehnisse wurzeln anscheinend in uralten Liedern und Geschichten. Können Legenden wahr werden? Ein Kampf gegen die Angst und neue Feinde wird entfesselt. Und diesmal ist der Preis das Leben aller. Wird Leet am Ende brennen?
Dieses Abenteuer aus der Reihe "Abenteuer in Trion" kann für sich alleine oder in Kombination mit den anderen Teilen aus der Serie gespielt werden. Es richtet sich an eine Gruppe, die bereits einige Herausforderungen gemeistert hat, und an erfahrene Spielleiter. Die Schwierigkeitsstufe kann dynamisch angepasst werdne.
- Ein Abenteuer für 3-7 Spieler.
- Kann optional als vierter Teil der Serie "Abenteuer aus Trion" gespielt werden.
- Vorgefertigte Spielcharaktere enthalten.
- Benötigt nur das Rolemaster Grundregelwerk und zwei zehnseitige Würfel.

Google translation

A nameless terror haunts Leet and the surrounding area. Mysterious events apparently rooted in ancient songs and stories. Can legends become true? A battle against fear and new enemies will be unleashed. And this time the price is the lives of all. Leet will burn at the end?
This adventure from the series "Adventures in Trion" can be played alone or in combination with the other parts of the series. It is aimed at a group that has already mastered some of the challenges, and to experienced game manager. The dificulty can be adjusted dynamically.
- An adventure for 3-7 players.
- Can optionally be played as the fourth installment of the series "Adventures of Trion."
- Pre-generated characters included.
- Requires only the Rolemaster rulebook and two ten-sided dice.

119339.name: White Wolf (Issue 5 - Dec 1986)
119339.description:
taken form the editorial by Steward Wieck.

This issue contains more material for AD&D it includes a compendium of 11 new monsters, some new magic items and a new charcter class.

119340.name: Held alter Tage
119340.description:
from the back of the book

Schon seit Jahren schwelt der Streit zwischen den Nachbardörfern Furtwasser und Grünweg. Ein nächtlicher Brandanschlag vernichtet den Kornspeicher in Grünweg. Eine Hungersnot droht. Gleichzeitig scheint die Situation zu eskalieren. Grünweg fordert Schadenersatz von Furtwasser. Von überall werden Söldner angeworben, um die Forderungen notfalls mit Waffengewalt durchzusetzen.
Der bewaffnete Konflikt scheint unausweichlich, doch eine Prophezeiung erinnert an Bernfried, den Helden alter Tage. Seine verschollenen Insignien (Helm, Panzer, Schwert, Schild und Speer) sollen den alten Helden wieder auferstehen lassen, damit er den Streit beilegen und alle zufrieden stellen wird.
Um die verschollenen Insignien wiederzufinden, bedarf es einer klugen Gruppe Abenteurer, die all ihren Mut und Verstand zusammen nimmt. auf dem Grabfeld von Berfrieds letzter Schalcht irren die Geister der Verstorbenen umher und bewachen ihre Schätze. Schwert und Schild sind verschollen. Und der Speer Bernfrieds befindet sich im Besitz des Erzfeindes!
Können Sie die Insignien Beschaffen? Kann Bernfried mit Ihrer Hilfe sein Volk wieder einen und Frieden stiften?
Kurzregeln für den Schnellen Einsteig der Spieler liegen bei.

Google translation
For years the simmering dispute between the neighboring villages Furtwasser and Grünweg. A nightly arson attack destroyed the Storage in Grünweg. A famine threatens. At the same time the situation seems to escalate. Grünweg demands repairs from Furtwasser. From all mercenaries are hired to meet the demands if necessary by force of arms.
The armed conflict seems inevitable, but a prophecy reminds Bernfried, the heroe of old days. Lost his regalia (helmet, armor, sword, shield and spear) to the ancient heroes can again be resurrected so that he settle the dispute and will satisfy all.
To regain the lost regalia, it requires a group of intelligent adventurers who take all their courage and mind together. On the field of graves of the last of Berfrieds battles the ghosts of the dead guard their treasures. Sword and shield are missing. And the spear Bernfrieds is owned by the arch-enemy!
You can procure the insignias? Can Bernfried with your help unite his people and make peace?
Short rules for a quick start are included.

119341.name: Tom & Jerry: The Ultimate Game of Cat and Mouse!
119341.description:
User Summary

Jerry's nephew Tuffy has been locked in a trunk in the attic by Tom. Your mission is to help Jetty make this way through each level of the house to help rescue him in time!

Various items along the way along with your endless supply of marbles helps you overcome Tom and any other obstacle which comes in your way.

119342.name: FNG: Second Tour
119342.description:
The oppressive jungle heat causes small beads of sweat to trickle down your brow. Or is it the fear? The enemy is close; you can feel it. Maybe he's around the next bend in the trail, waiting to bushwhack the tired or unwary. Does that bush hide a machine gun? Tunnel entrance under that clump of leafs? Maybe there's a sniper lying in wait up in that tree? Your squad looks to you for leadership, for knowledge, for guts. Do you have what it takes? Can you lead them and get them home alive?

Or are you headed for disaster, just another Freakin' New Guy in The Nam?

FNG: Second Tour (FNG2T) is the second edition of FNG. We've streamlined the mechanics and kicked up the realism. FNG2T gives you what you need to run your grunts through infantry combat in Vietnam during 1967-1968.

Don't have an opponent? No problem! FNG: Second Tour also includes extensive solo mechanics so you can play against the game either by yourself or with friends all on the same side! FNG: Second Tour is designed to be played with one figure representing one man and in any figure scale you may already have. Artillery, airstrikes, helicopter gunships, Puff the Magic Dragon, bunkers, tunnels, and more. FNG: Second Tour has them all and much more.

FNG: Second Tour also includes a unique campaign system to carry your Star (your personal soldier) through an entire combat tour of exotic Vietnam. This campaign system not only generates your missions, but also your enemies, rewards for success and repercussions for failure, even the terrain in which you will play.

All this lets us guarantee that you'll never fight the exact same mission more than once.

As your campaign progresses, so does the experience and abilities of your troops. If you command well, some might even survive long enough to rotate home and be replaced by fresh FNGs. But, if you lead poorly you will see more than your share of body-bags.

So throw on your favorite 60's music, lock and load, and head out into the jungle. The enemy is waiting. Will you have the guts, or will you bejust another FNG?

The oppressive jungle heat causes small beads of sweat to trickle down your brow. Or is it the fear?

The enemy is close; you can feel it. Maybe he's around the next bend in the trail, waiting to bushwhack the tired or unwary. Does that bush hide a machine gun? Tunnel entrance under that clump of leafs? Maybe there's a sniper lying in wait up in that tree?

Your squad looks to you for leadership, for knowledge, for guts. Do you have what it takes? Can you lead them and get them home alive?

Re-implements:

FNG

119343.name: RECALL
119343.description:
RECALL is designed to measure and improve your ability to recall information. RECALL does not require exception memory capabilities but rather relies on organizational techniques to help you organize information to improved memory.

How does RECALL work? There are six thematic game boards with different pictures on each board. There are eighty tiles with pictures on each board. There are eighty tiles with pictures of familiar objects printed one each tile. The object of the game is to place these tiles face down on the game board, and use cues from the images on the board to the develop associations that assist you in recalling which object is on each tiles as you turn them over. You can start with just a few tiles and work up to recalling the objects on dozens of tiles.

RECALL can be played as a single-player activity, as a cooperative game, or as a competitive game. It can also be used as a great learning tool for kids.

You will be surprised how well your organizational techniques work. You will see improvement in your recall capability immediately!

For competitive play two or more players can play the game competitively. Each player takes a turn selecting, placing, and turning over Object Tiles. The number of correct Object Tiles is recorded and the player with the most correctly placed tiles wins.

To play cooperatively all players collectively decide on where to place Object Tiles.

119344.name: Spaniel
119344.description:
This is a 3-player game, using 3 colours (Black, White & Red), but with no colour representing any one player. It is played using a standard Shibumi set.
In essence, it is a simple connect-3 game. The winner is the player that connects 3 of any colour in a visible straight line (“visible” meaning that, for instance, a 3-in-a-row going through the middle of the pyramid, with stones all round, blocking one or more stones from sight, is not a win).

The board starts empty. Each player places 2 stones each turn, in this order:
P.1: B, W
P.2: R, B
P.3: W, R
Passing is not allowed, and the stones must be played in this specific order. There is no removal of stones in this game.

That is the full extent of the rules. A draw can indeed occur.

This game was created in response to the Shibumi Challenge.

Included in the Shibumi Rule Book

Soft cover:

http://www.lulu.com/shop/cameron-browne-and-nestor-romeral-a...

Downloadable PDF:

http://www.nestorgames.com/rulebooks/SHIBUMI_EN.pdf

119345.name: Hello Kitty Seasons
119345.description:
Hello Kitty's First Nintendo Wii title!

Join Hello Kitty and her friends in their latest adventure - this time in the charming Sanrio Town! The first ever Hello Kitty title for the Nintendo Wii, Hello Kitty Seasons is an adventure-based game in which you manage the lovely little Sanrio Town by participating in various exciting quests and missions. The passage of time is marked by the turning of the seasons, which affect Sanrio Town in different ways and unlock new missions and challenges. As you progress through the game you will be able to upgrade the town, customize your avatar, collect in-game items including clothing and accessories, and much more!

Source: The Developer Website.

119346.name: Dog Poop
119346.description: Have you ever wanted to poop in someone’s yard? Well here is your chance. In Dog Poop, it is your objective to dig holes, trample flowers, knock over the garbage, and find mystery goodies in other back yards. Naturally, you are trying to do all this while keeping your own yard as clean as possible. There are special things you can get like a scoop to clean your yard or the cat to draw other dogs away. Get in touch with your inner poodle or wolf hound as the case may be. All in all, this game is a bunch of laughs for everyone involved.

119347.name: Clock Tower II: The Struggle Within
119347.description:
Clock Tower II: The Struggle Within (Clock Tower: Ghost Head in Japan) is a survival horror created by Human Entertainment, published by Agetec, and released for the PlayStation in 1998. It is a spin-off to the Clock Tower series and has almost nothing to do with the previous games besides its gameplay.

Following its predecessors, the gameplay is more about hiding and solving puzzles, rather than fighting the player's pursuers. This degenerates as the plot advances, and the main character is eventually forced to use guns and other tools in several endgame action sequences.

Its interface consists of a point-and-click system similar to the one used by Sierra Entertainment games, such as the Gabriel Knight series. There is an inventory screen that appears if the user drags the pointer to the upper side of the screen. The game's engine looks similar to Clock Tower 2 (Clock Tower in North America), with a few minor alterations.

Clock Tower Ghost Head features three chapters whose length can change depending on the choices made by the player. The game's replay value comes mostly in its 13 endings, which normally portray the main character dying in different violent ways. The paths to each separate ending can be confusing and difficult to follow accurately and, as such, many players utilize walkthroughs in order to achieve them.

Source: Wikipedia, "Clock Tower II: The Struggle Within", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

119348.description:
Publisher blurb to be added here***




Destiny Collins knows how to recruit the help you need. Whether she needs to sacrifice herself or is able to sweet talk them into submission, anyone opposing Destiny will soon be facing more then her alone.

The pack comes pre-wrapped with:
1 Destiny Collins draft card
7 Destiny Collins cards

Destiny Collins is one of the promos designed along with Nightfall: Blood Country.
119348.name: Nightfall: Destiny Collins Promo

119350.description:
Publisher blurb to be added here***




Silas Bragg is a blood sucker who isn't happy about it. He licks his wounds and keeps right on fighting, and if you make him mad enough, he'll even turn on his own.

The pack comes pre-wrapped with:
1 Silas Bragg draft card
7 Silas Bragg cards
Silas Bragg is one of the promos designed along with Nightfall: Blood Country.
119350.name: Nightfall: Silas Bragg Promo

119351.name: Space Shibumi Invaders!
119351.description:
Aliens are attacking! Invading Sector V!

The player must maneuver their Defender craft and shoot down advancing aliens as they descend from the sky. You have limited repair resources and ammunition for your laser cannon is in short supply. Eliminate all the Invaders before they either successfully land, or destroy the Defenser which occupies the bottom of the playfield

A solo play Space Invaders style game using the full Shibumi game set.

119352.name: AnimeniA
119352.description:
From the introduction:

AnimeniA uses the SPFX system, which is a modular roleplaying rules set, designed to allow users to create a game system that is as light or crunchy as they desire.

The system is built around four standard gaming concepts.

"From Publishers website:"

Characters
Characters are made of 3 major stats; Physical, Mental, and Presence all rated between 2 and 7. Each stat has substats that can boost the number in certain situations up to +3.

Conflict
Conflict is a roll off between two characters in the game. The roll is stat+skill+dice, with the higher roll winning. The stat can have one of the substats applied if appropriate. The character can use their skill set if it is appropriate or expertise. If the character has neither then it is just the stat. situational modifiers can also be applied by the Architect.

Props
Props are equipment, weapons, vehicles, objects, and other stuff in the game. Each has a DAN representing how much damage it can take before breaking, or even how much protection it might provide in combat.

Combat
Combat is a conflict with a few extra rules added in. Characters will roll initiative (Physical +Speed +Dice) the higher number goes first. Each character takes turn performing actions.

user comment
there is no publication year on the PDF

119353.name: Metaphysical Powers
119353.description:
From the introduction:

These supernatural powers allow characters to tap into metaphysical energies and manipulate them to their will. Whether it is tapping into the body’s natural
energy, the forces of nature, the power of the mind, or command of mystical creatures. Metaphysical powers are essentially like skill sets; they act and work in much the same way. The major difference is the fact that metaphysical powers cost energy to utilize; limiting how many times a character can use them in a game session.

119354.description:

rpgissuearticle.74862: FUN IN GAMES - Who gets the most enjoyment out of a roleplaying session?

119361.description:
From the introduction:

THE JOHNN FOUR INTERVIEW
RETURN OF THE ‘ING - Mark Newbold discusses coming back to gaming
FUN IN GAMES - Who gets the most enjoyment out of a roleplaying session?
JONATHAN HICKS’S TOP TEN RPGs – The clue is in the title

119362.name: ODDS: The Tabletop Roleplaying E-Magazine (Issue 9 - Jul 2009)
119362.description:
From the introduction:

UK GAMES EXPO 2009 REPORT
Last Issue

119363.description:
This is a mini expansion for Octopus' Garden which enables more strategy through the use of the Coral tiles. Now, Coral tiles can provide much more Beauty Points with the Parrot Fish.

Available exclusively at the BoardGameGeek store.
119363.name: Octopus' Garden: Parrot Fish

119364.name: Minions!
119364.description:
Minions! is a strategic race through the woods!
You control a force of creatures and race against your opponent to get 3 creatures to the opposite side of the board.
You can summon Wolves, squash Frogs and use magical Elves to push Turtles into fire.
Each creature has unique, interactive abilities that create different possibilities.
Minions! is essentially an abstract game of movement, with no dice and very little chance. However, unlike many abstract games, there are many different ways to play, and creative strategy is the key to success.

119365.name: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer DVD Game
119365.description:
Help Rudolph, Santa, Hermey the Elf, and Clarice save Christmas while reliving favorite moments from the classic TV special, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer®. Enjoy fun mini-games and on-screen puzzles as you wind around the themed game board rescuing Misfit Toys from Bumble the Abominable Snow Monster. Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer The DVD Game is sure to go down in history and become your family's must-play game every holiday season!

A powerful storm has scattered the Misfit Toys all around the North Pole and Santa needs your help collecting them! Gather the Misfit Toys to help Santa make his delivery on Christmas Eve. The players race to collect the Misfit Toys before Bumble the Abominable Snow Monster can find them. If any player collects three different-colored Misfit Toys before Bumble collects any six toys, that player wins the game.

119366.name: Going to Market

boardgamecompilation.155986: Cambio y Bolsa, Mercado, y Miau

119366.description:
An especially nice promotional card game from 1915, published by a paint producer (still active nearly 100 years later).

Each player tries to collect sets of the same numbered card. They ask for cards from other players (which must be handed over) but if you are unsuccessful in your search then you end your turn by drawing a card. Once a set is collected, it is placed in front of the player who completed this task. Eventually, all sets will be collected and the player with the most sets, wins.

Each card is an advert for products at the time. The products are;
Pompeian Night Cream and other cosmetics
Kelly-Springfield Tires and Tubes
Several different Willys-Overland vehicles
Post cereals
Welch's Punch, Lemonade, others
Beech-Nut Chewing Gum, Peanut Butter and Bacon. (Bacon!!)
Knox Gelatin desserts
Perfection Oil Cook stoves, ovens, heaters
Western Electric, Phones, Irons, washing machines
Libby's Hawaiian Pineapple, evaporated milk, fruits
Ingersoll Dollar , Junior, Midget and Eclipse Watches
Men's and Women's Walk-Over shoes.
Sherwin-Williams SWP House Paint, varnish and wall paint.

I think that each publisher was given copies of the game to sell or give away to their respective customers and/or staff. Comes in a red box.

119367.name: Gumdrop Bridge
119367.description:
User Summary

In Gumdrop Bridge, the player constructs a flexible bridge, strong enough for a delivery truck to cross, with toothpicks and gumdrops. Use your physics knowledge and imagination to build a strong bridge. Collect all of the gold coins to get to the next level.

119368.name: aTilt 3D Labyrinth
119368.description:
aTilt 3D Labyrinth is a labyrinth-style maze game with an emphasis on realistic physics, 3D graphics, and a top-notch Android gaming experience.

Source: The Developer Website.

119369.name: Football Express
119369.description:
A spin-off from the regular Subbuteo game of football. This was a Five-A-Side version, with an enclosed pitch so that the ball didn't always fly of the table. The mechanic of finger flicking the players remains the same.

Subbuteo is a classic finger-flicking soccer-simulation action game. It is played on a large cloth playing field called a "pitch", with teams of players that are represented by miniature men mounted on smooth round bases. The men are made to kick the ball by flicking their bases, which causes the men to slide around on the pitch, hitting the ball. The rules simulate nearly all details of a soccer game including ball possession and passing, throw-ins, goal kicks and corner kicks. There is even a large section in the rules devoted to fouling.

Two editions were produced. One with a folding pitch, the other with a solid pitch. Obviously, the solid pitch edition was in a box twice the size of the folding pitch edition.

Re-implements:

Subbuteo

119370.description:
In Sails to Steam, a game for 2–5 players, each player takes charge of a different empire that it must lead to economic prosperity.

Starting with a small fleet comprised of a few meager sailboats and a canoe, players will build boats, settle colonies, and even found new countries in an effort to spread the influence of their mighty empire. As their influence and power expands, players must carefully gauge and react to the global economy created by their fellow players and attempt to leverage their advantages to push out other empires if they plan to become the mightiest empire.
119370.name: Sails to Steam

119371.description:
Although there are a number of simulations for the dramatic events in Bavaria, Austrian and Spain in 1809, not much emphasis has been placed on conflicts in Prussia or in the Grand Duchy of Warsaw. However there were uprisings and armies in conflict in Eastern Europe, especially in the newly created Duchy of Warsaw.
La Bataille de Raszyn depicts the major battle between the VII Austrian Armeekorps and the Polish Forces defending Warsaw. The invasion force commanded by Archduke Ferdinand d’Este drives toward the capital of Poland being defended by General Poniatowski. Poniatowski decides to defend a crucial river crossing that has limited crossings and swampy ground.

The forces of Poniatowski are limited as much of the Polish forces are fighting in Spain. His available forces have excellent morale being highly motivated to defend a country once partitioned by Austrian, Prussia and Russia. A contingent of Saxons assist the Polish Army and scenarios add a variety of forces from neighboring areas.

D’ Este ‘Austrian’ Army is in fact made up of infantry from Hungary and Galician (Poland), with Grenz (border) troops and a sizable number of elite cavalry. Although this army outnumbers the forces of Poniatowski, it may lack the motivation and leadership of their counterpoints. The Austrian Army’s tactics include some of the recent reforms and traditional formations. Option rules and scenarios provide for a number of ‘what ifs” and fresh simulations

Each 20 minute turn starts with a Command Phase for both sides followed by the French Player sequence and then by the Prussian Player sequence. The sequence includes movement, cavalry charges, fire and melee. During each, morale plays a decisive role. This is a great one player on one player game that can be completed in an afternoon. In addition to the historical game there are two scenarios that vary the orders of battle and appearance times.
The original rules have been updated but not expanded to any extent. The original designers of the La Bataille Series believe the Premier Rules facilitate the most accurate and competitive play. The new Premier Rules are an update of the original rules but make it easier to find specific topics and includes some user requested rules such as command control.
Marshal Enterprises intends to publish a Napoleonic Grand Tactical Game every quarter. The games are free by down loading all the required documents at our website. Each specific title will have a Special Rules Package. Options include printing the map as a series of 11”x17” pages or as a two or one piece file. Instructions are included to make the unit and informational counters. Keep you r money for something important and have fun battling in Poland
119371.name: La Bataille de Raszyn 1809

119372.description:
In Canaille, each player takes the role of a fisherman to takes part of fishing contest and must compose short plays ending in a point by using the action cards.

But the cat Canaille goes around and try to steal the fruits of your fishing. Be smart and send Canaille at your opponents!

In his turn player lines up in front of him 1-5 cards in
a specific order as his fishing luck and takes actions accordingly: drawing cards trying to catch fish, exchanging cards or sending the cat to steal fish from other players.

Player with the most fish at the end of the game is the winner.
119372.name: Canaille

119373.name: Raumpatrouille: Grundregeln
119373.description:
RAUMPATROUILLE RPG - Teil 1 Grundregeln

The idea of the Raumpatrouille RPG based on the german TV serie Raumpatroullie Orion. - see Wikipedia

Fantastic adventure in the year 3000 while the series over 40 years old all was in black/white and the electric iron as requisite controlls the mighty Orion and the communicating worked over a shower head.

Take your place in this retro sience fiction roleplaying and defend earth against the aliens from outer space.

The core rules free for download including ship and hero sheets.

---
user summary

119374.description:
Poker meets bingo.
The goal of the game is to accumulate a maximum amount of coins into 3 parts, by collecting over the cards announced the best combinations.

The game is divided into three parts:
1) Pre flop is the phase of play before seeing cards.
2) Turn is the second time to bet after seeing the cards.
3) River is the last to bet before unveiling his game

Players bet for the cards to get better combinations for their boards.

Player who accumulated the most chips at the end of three parts is the winner.
119374.name: Family Pok

119375.description:
The first player takes as many tiles he thinks he can remember and forms face-down tile-row on the table.
The next player can either add a tile to the row to be the first player or place it behind the row. All players do the same.

The player who leads the row must state the colors of the tiles one by one. If successful, it gets rid of his generous balls of wool by distributing to each opponent. If he's not successful, the other shepherds give him a free ball of wool. And it was the turn of the second player on the row to state the colors.

The first player to get rid of his balls of wool wins the game.
119375.name: Mouton Rebêêêle

119376.description:
An observation, memory and dexterity game for 2-4 little detectives.
Inside the box there is a castle with ghosts, and a tower in the middle. The ghosts are encrypted cards, hidden in the castle’s walls and players can see them thanks to a special red lens.
Inside the tower there are 4 bags, one for each player.

Players have to find the ghosts and try to drop them from the tower inside their bags.
During the game, each player has a target ghost.
During his round, the player moves his detective in the room he wants. He looks with the special lens the ghosts in the room.
After 10 seconds, the player can indicate one ghost:
- if it’s the same ghost of his target, he takes 3 little ghosts (each ghost is a small ball). He tries to put them in his bag from the tower. The player draws a new target ghost.
- otherwise, if it same ghost of another player, this player will drop 3 little ghosts. This player draws a new target ghost.
- if nobody has the ghost, the other players will drop 1 little ghost.
If the player thinks that his ghost isn't in the room, he doesn't choose any card: nothing appends.

When targets or little ghosts finished, the game ends.
Players remove the castle and look at the bags: the player with more little ghosts wins.
119376.name: Caccia al fantasma

119377.name: Raffa la giraffa
119377.description:
A dexterity game for 2-4 players, with a tree and 30 cubes.
Roll 2 dice, then use a cube to lengthen your giraffe's neck, according to the colour and the special action of the 2 dice.
Special actions:
- put the neck on the top of your giraffe;
- put the neck on the bottom of your giraffe;
- put the neck on the top of your giraffe, without using the thumb;
- lift the giraffe over the table, put the neck on the top;
- steal the neck from an opponent (you will take the coloured neck and the other necks over it).
The player who reaches the leaf on the tree wins.

119378.name: Triple Town

videogamehonor.30002: 2012 D.I.C.E. Best Social Networking Game/Web Based Game of the Year Nominee

119378.description:
In Triple Town, you build a colony in a brave new frontier. By carefully planting trees and bushes, you'll craftily grow huts and then houses and finally the mythical floating citadel. Can you build the city of your dreams?

Source: The Developer Website.

119379.name: Junk Jack
119379.description:
User Summary

Follow Jack on his 2D, sprite-based adventures and literally get to the bottom of things, as he searches for raw materials. Through the use of a workbench, anvil, spinning wheel, forge, and a loom, transform those raw materials into valuable items and weapons.

119380.name: My Little Monster
119380.description:
MY LITTLE MONSTER is a retro-style monster simulator/RPG. Take care of your monster, train, buy high fashion hats, learn skills and take on the 31 unique enemies.

A story about love, loss and the urge to destroy the world...

Source: The Game Website.

119381.name: Paul & Percy
119381.description:
Drinking tea and eating biscuits. Life in the 5th dimension has been easy. Until now. Paul & Percy's beloved butter biscuits have vanished without a trace. Who took them, where are they and how do they get them back? If the two gentlemen ever are to enjoy the sweet taste of tea and biscuits again, they’ll have to use their combined efforts to solve the mystery.

Paul and Percy is a puzzle game where you have to co-operate with yourself in order to progress through a strange but inviting world. Jump, push and stomp your way through an epic puzzling adventure. Took wrong step? No problem, the 5th dimension features a handy rewind button that makes puzzle solving more fun than ever.

Source: The Developer Website.

119382.name: Save the Furries
119382.description:
Help Save the Furries across 60 levels in this puzzle-adventure!

Furries are cute green creatures that like to visit strange planets and then stroll about oblivious to the dangers around them.

Source: The Publisher Website.

119383.name: Dead Meets Lead

videogamehonor.39320: 2011 Swedish Game Awards Game of the Year Winner

119383.description:
Dead Meets Lead is every bit and piece of what a challenging zombie-slaying action game should be. Enter the role of the 18th century commander who’s on a mission to obliterate evil, by fighting your way through the island of El Mirando. A mystic plague has consumed the inhabitants of this island and you’ll have to liberate their souls by sword, and travel deep into the island to find and stop the dark minds behind the cursed disease. You’ll have to act, think and move fast if you want to survive the horrors of these wicked parts of the world. And do not hope for any rescue or help, it’s all up to you and you alone!

Source: The Game Website.

119384.name: Abenteuer. (Issue 5 - Herbst 2010)
119384.description: This issue is an "emergency edition" which include 3 adventures and scenarios for Mechwarrior. Due to delays it was only published at the end of April 2011.

119385.name: Windgeflüster (Issue 40 - Jul 1998)
119385.description: This issue conatains the adventure "Der goldene Hammmer" and an interview with Margaret Weis, and a short story "Wer wagt, gewinnt"

119386.name: MapleStory: Cave Crawlers
119386.description:
User Summary

Enter the world of MapleStory once more for an adventure of a different kind. "Cave Crawlers" blends more traditional JRPG elements with touch controls and "Rouge" like exploration.

119387.name: Turniej Złotorożca
119387.description:
Turniej Złotorożca is a easy to learn polish card game for 2-3 players, in which everyone tries to get the most victory points by defeating opponents in duels (your card have to got more points of might, strenght, wisdom or beauty - depending on kind of duel). The main mechanic is very similar to card game "War", but is less random because players can choose which card play (from 4 available).

Game consist:
- 60 cards
- rulebook

119388.name: Frostbite (Windows)
119388.description:
A post apocalyptic soldier in a watchtower going mad on a nuclear winter, seeing things and with some serious memory problems.

Source: The Developer Website.

119389.name: Das Stirnrunzeln der Mutter
119389.description:
user summary

Das Stirnrunzeln der Mutter
(The frown of the mother) contains 2 adventures for ERPS for 3 to 5 heroes.

119390.name: Deal-a-Dart
119390.description:
Cardgame consisting of 69 playing cards and 3 instruction cards (English & Dutch), developed for dart players by (the dart brand) Bull's.

Rules include a introduction and full game, and offers variants for both.

All 62 dart board scoring areas are represented by individual cards, thus creating 3 suits: singles doubles and trebles.

On a player's turn, a player select an open or blind card, and either returns a card, or plays a shot. The amount on the card is subtracted from the players score, which (by agreement) can be 101, 201, or 301. To win a player had to hit exactly 0 with the last shot, AND the last card played should be a 'double'.

In the more advanced game the player is allowed to open as many 'pile' as he likes, but scores negative points for unfinished piles.

119391.description:
Il Vecchio is set in the 15th century, when Cosimo de Medici – also called "Il Vecchio" ("the Elder) – and his family ruled over Tuscany and its capital Florence. The players represent the heads of Florentine families trying to rise their families to power. To achieve this, they send out their family members to locations in Tuscany to perform various tasks, specifically to recruit followers (knights, assassins, abbots) and collect money as both are needed to take control of provinces in neighboring regions; controlled provinces provide power and a bonus action. Another task is to gain the favor of the squirearchy as these favors are indispensable when it comes to getting an official position in Florence, e.g., a seat on the town council to enhance actions in Tuscany, or a noble rank to gain power at the end of the game.

To complete these tasks, however, a proper middleman must be present at a location, and as these middlemen travel a lot, they are rarely met. That's why it is so important to have one's family members in the right place at the right time – to save on time and money while achieving one's goals.

At the beginning of the game, each player has four family members in Tuscany. Players take turns performing exactly one action. Before his action, a player may pay money to move one of his own family members to another location. The available actions are to:


Take a location-specific action in Tuscany. This requires both a middleman and one of your own standing (active) family members at that location. After the action, this family member is laid down (inactive).
Travel to another region and take over a province, which costs both followers and money.
Travel to Florence where you'll spend scrolls (and possibly money) to claim a city council or nobility tile.
Introduce a new family member to the board.
Raise all lying family members on the board.


The game ends when the "Power of the Medici" has faded, as indicated by a diminishing pile of crest tiles. Certain actions require you to remove such a tile, and the game ends when they're all gone. Players then sum their power points – earned for gained tiles and majorities in the regions and Florence – for a final scoring, and the player with the most power wins.
119391.name: Il Vecchio

119393.name: Fantasywelt (Issue 23 - 1989)
119393.description:
This issue contains 3 short adventures "Die Statuette", "Crime-Story" & "Das Rennen".

the published year is not proven

---
user summary

119394.name: Twisted Tails
119394.description:
